newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Guangnan shrs rise on strong 96 profits.
newsitem.headline: Guangnan shrs rise on strong 96 profits.

text.p: Guangnan (Holdings) Ltd shares were firmer on Friday on steady buying fuelled by better-than-expected 1996 earning figures announced on Thursday, brokers said.
The shares hit a high of HK$10.25 before retreating slightly to HK$10.10, up HK$0.05, in late Friday morning.
The food distributor posted an 85.5 percent rise on its net profit for 1996 and analysts were generally revising up their forecasts for this year, brokers said.
"We expect the company to post a 50 percent rise on its net in 1997," said an analyst at Deutsche Morgan Grenfell.
Mansion House said in a report that it recommended a buy on the stock due to the company's dynamic management and proven ability in acquiring new projects and investment to sustain growth.
